Welcome!

Welcome to my new and wonderful blog. I hope to bring insights into software development, scientific computing, and also some chatting about photography.

Under Active Development

Now that every waking moment isn’t spent trying to appease the Physics Gods with menacing homework problems I’m going to begin to migrate some/all/most of my programming work onto my GitHub and on this blog. So, please bear with me if something seems a bit funny for the time being!
